stepTitle: A 10-ft ladder is leaning against a wall.
stepBody: If the top of the ladder slides down the wall at a rate of $$2$$ $$\frac{ft}{sec}$$, how fast is the bottom moving along the ground when the bottom of the ladder is $$5$$ ft from the wall? All answers are in $$\frac{ft}{sec}$$.##figure1.gif##
